description.description: A brief description of the project

mainLink.description: A URI pointing to a live running instance of the project

srcLink.description: A URI pointing to the project's source code on GitHub

appLogoURI.description: A URI pointing to a displayable copy of the project's logo

screenshotUri1.description: A URI pointing to a screenshot that shows the app in action

screenshotUri2.description: A URI pointing to a second screenshot of the app

detailDescription.description: A more detailed description of the project

archDiagramUri.description: A URI pointing to a copy of the project's architecture diagram

category.description: The category of the technology (e.g., frontend, backend, database)

tools.description: A list of languages, frameworks, etc. used in the project for the corresponding category

techStack.description: An array of technologies used in the project
